This is noticed that some notorious people or group " + "of people are damaging and making scratches on the vehicles in the society. " + "This is humble request to all the residents to keep their eye " + "and ear open towards such nuisance creators.\n" + "\n" + "Kindly be vigilant and inform the security personels whenever" + " you are on vacation or on long travel and your house is locked" + " so that security personells can be more vigilant and careful.
The meeting shall sharp start at 10.30 am. If the quorum of the meeting" + " is not present at that time, the meeting shall be adjourned for another half an hour from 10.30 am. The adjourne" + "d meeting take place 11.00 am at the same date and venue. In the adjourned meeting no quorum is necessary. "Dear Residents,\n" + "\n" + "Resident Welfare Association would like to inform you that " + "a new scrap dealer, Mr. Mahesh Chand has been appointed in" + " place of old scrap dealer Mr. Subhash.\n" + "\n" + "So from now (1st January 2015), RWA authorize Mr Mahesh as" + " the new scrap dealer for Sanskriti Apartments. RWA have" + " made a legal contract with him and fixed a fees of" + " Rs. 6000/- per month (Rs. 72000 per annum) in comparison" + " to the previous one which was Rs. 1000/- per month (Rs. 12000/- per annum)."
